about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Engineer by passion, problem solver by nature

bio.p1: Computer engineer with a solid foundation in backend and frontend development, evolved into a rare hybrid profile: someone who codes, understands architecture, masters complex pipelines, and operates in strict security environments.
bio.p2: Notable for designing and maintaining high-level pipelines, especially in OCR, computer vision, and multimodal language models. Building solutions with docTR, PaddleOCR, LayoutLMv3, and Qwen3-VL, deploying them in on-prem Kubernetes while meeting strict security requirements.
bio.p3: Beyond coding, I understand Scrum from the inside, participate in refinements, write clear user stories, manage technical debt, and anticipate sprint risks. The goal is not just working software, but a working team.
